text: The Company's tax expenses decreased by ₹146.55 lakhs (115.66%), from ₹126.71 lakhs in Fiscal 2023 to ₹273.26 lakhs in Fiscal 2024, primarily due to increase in current tax in fiscal 2024.

The Company's profit after tax increased by ₹375.16 lakhs (113.76%) to ₹704.94 lakhs in Fiscal 2024, compared to ₹329.78 lakhs in Fiscal 2023, primarily due to increase in revenue from operation from domestic sales and cost management contributed to the profit growth.
The following table sets forth certain information relating to our cash flows in the periods indicated:

In Fiscal 2025, Net cash flow from operating activities was ₹1,122.22 Lakhs and Our profit before tax for that period was ₹1,109.75 Lakhs. This difference was primarily due to depreciation of ₹ 360.14 lakhs, finance cost ₹ 407.70 lakhs and thereafter change in working capital of ₹ 1,861.56 lakhs respectively. We have income tax paid of (₹238.73) lakhs.

In Fiscal 2024, Net cash flow from operating activities was ₹563.54 Lakhs and Our profit before tax of ₹978.20 Lakhs. This difference was primarily due to depreciation of ₹ 305.48 lakhs, finance cost ₹ 332.44 lakhs and thereafter change in working capital of ₹ 1,631.68 lakhs respectively. We have income tax paid of (₹103.51) lakhs.

During Fiscal 2023, Net cash flow from operating activities was ₹1,212.07 Lakhs with a profit before tax of ₹456.49 Lakhs. This difference was primarily due to depreciation of ₹ 290.88 lakhs, finance cost ₹ 307.02 lakhs and thereafter change in working capital of ₹ 1,186.02 lakhs respectively. We have income tax paid of (₹60.70) lakhs.
Net cash from investing activities was (₹2,629.91) Lakhs. The outflow was primarily driven by purchase of fixed assets of ₹ 2,645.94 Lakhs which was offset by the Interest income during the year.
Net cash from investing activities was (₹760.62) Lakhs. The outflow was primarily driven by purchase of fixed assets of ₹ 762.36 Lakhs which was offset by the Interest income during the year.
Net cash from investing activities was (₹238.73) Lakhs. The outflow was primarily driven by purchase of fixed assets of ₹ 240.88 Lakhs which was offset by the Interest income during the year.
